response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value and ensures you secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 1200000}
